Interface ControllerIO

All Superinterfaces:
SonarObject
All Known Subinterfaces:
Alarm, Beacon, Camera, Detector, Device, DMS, FlowStream, GateArm, GateArmArray, Gps, LaneMarking, LCSArray, LCSIndication, RampMeter, TagReader, VideoMonitor, WeatherSensor
All Known Implementing Classes:
AlarmImpl, BeaconImpl, CameraImpl, ControllerIoImpl, DetectorImpl, DeviceImpl, DMSImpl, FlowStreamImpl, GateArmArrayImpl, GateArmImpl, GpsImpl, LaneMarkingImpl, LCSArrayImpl, LCSIndicationImpl, RampMeterImpl, TagReaderImpl, VideoMonitorImpl, WeatherSensorImpl
public interface ControllerIO extends SonarObject
ControllerIO is an input/output connected to a controller (alarm or device)
Author:
Douglas Lau
